column5: Paul hasn't posted in over a month. Has anyone heard from him?
Roy I was thinking the same thing, I'll give him a call
I dont mean to Hijack the thread  but i havent seen any posts from father of 3, his nick was something along those lines. He posted quite a bit last year, bass and carp. Hopefully all is alright.
Roy I know he has been having some health issues. I was talking to him about his boat via PM,but have not heard from him in a few weeks.  Hope he,s ok.
Paul is having computer issues.....ITS BROKEN  Someone is trying to get him fixed back up soon.
Thanks Phil. As long as his health is ok, that's the main thing.
Paul and I were discussing our aches and pains via e-mail a couple of weeks ago...  I try to keep him on my forwarding jokes list just to keep in touch...
